Class Bucephalus

  • java.lang.Object
    • Villain
      • Bucephalus

  • public class Bucephalus
extends Villain
    Instances of Bucephalus represent a type of Villain that the player can battle in the game. Each Game object should use at most one Bucephalus object, to avoid duplicate encounters in the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static int DAMAGE_DEALT
      Damage dealt by a villain to a hero's health when it wins the game.
      private static MiniGameType[] GAMES_PLAYED
      Array of games the villain could choose to play.
      private static java.lang.String NAME
      The villain's name.
      private static java.lang.String TAUNT
      Taunt shouted by the villain at the start of a battle.
